item.title: Holiday Escape
item.dc:creator: Mikel
item.description: I led a team of 16 in all aspects of design, construction, and execution of a week-long escape room installation. Holiday Escape was the 2021 installment of the annual escape room, hosted by WPI's Interactive Media department.
item.content:encoded:
I led a team of 16 in all aspects of design, construction, and execution of a week-long escape room installation. Holiday Escape was the 2021 installment of the annual escape room, hosted by Worcester Polytechnic Institute’s Interactive Media program.

Project Website

Additional details/content coming soon. In the meantime, feel free to see the project website above or check out some of my other projects!
